extendedInfo.description: A simple way to design and organize your wedding. Your wedding planner is organized into 2 sections: Design and Vendors. Design allows you to collect all of your inspirational ideas photographically and visualize them in an organized way. Take pictures of all of the dress ideas you have, or flower arrangements you like, or cake designs (plus more), and organize them all in the "Design" section. Show your friends and family your vision by showing them your âDesignâ album. The âDesignâ section has a mood board! For each category, you can select an image to use as an album cover to create your mood board.  Setting up your mood board allows you to visualize your dream wedding day once you have chosen your style for each category. You can see how your hair style, make-up, cake, dress, florist, caterer, invitation, photographer, shoes, tux, and venue all look together by choosing an image in each category and setting it as an album cover. This creates your unique mood board and allows you to visualize how your design looks all together. The countdown allows you to set your wedding date and countdown the days until your dream wedding day! The "Vendors" section allows you to organize and view all of the possible vendors you have been communicating with. Are you speaking with multiple florists, and want to stay organized? Add all of the your florist contacts to the âVendorsâ section and be able to call or email them with the click of a button.A fun message from the developer: I don't know about you, but I had so much trouble trying to collect images for my wedding and organizing all of my vendor information. Trying to visualize my dream day by taking pictures of 10 dresses, 5 flower arrangements, 10 venues... And then having to sift through all the photos in my phone to share this info with my bridal party for advice was a nightmare. That's why I made this app :) From one bride to another, a simple way to design and organize your dream day.

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Makes keeping info convenient. Would be nice to remove or edit areas you won\'t use for others (eg. Venue)
reviews.author: Joanna Maksay

reviews.title: Good ap, but not quite worth $3.99
reviews.comment: I do find the ap useful, but the main difference between the paid version and the free version is tracking the budget..which I don\'t use... It would be nice if there was some sort of list/notebook feature to keep track of other wedding details, like bridal party names and contact info as well as vendors, reception songs, to-do checklists, etc.
reviews.author: Kelley O\'Brien

reviews.comment: Would be 5 if we didn\'t have to pay to upgrade to features other apps give for free
reviews.author: Shannon Alexander

reviews.title: wedding design
reviews.comment: fun game
reviews.author: Pao Pauline

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Super easy to use, really helpful to keep organized
reviews.author: Jalina Bowers

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: This app is very helpful and is great for keeping pictures of things so you can look back on them.
reviews.author: Shannon Adelle Beasley

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Its like a mini scrapbook of what ur wedding will b like!!! I think they should add more picture slots for decorations
reviews.author: Aly Childers

reviews.title: Many problems
reviews.comment: I loved this app until I logged into it & found it deleted most all of my pics & stuff. Please fix this issue its awful to lose all my stuff. I am planning a wedding and need a better reliable app! I cant have this one deleting my stuff.
reviews.author: Amanda Klich

reviews.title: Wtc!?!
reviews.comment: Worked great until I put every bit of my wedding ideas in it. Now I can\'t even view my pictures. Good thing I had a backup set.
reviews.author: diamond johnson

reviews.title: Opinion to improve
reviews.comment: In design you should be able to add categories and notes to your pictures to make it more dyd friendly
reviews.author: sonia jane-marsich

reviews.comment: Great for helping store your wedding stuff

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Great app helps you a lot. Nice to have a place to put pictures as well

reviews.comment: Love this app, would have been perfect if you could make more categories :(

reviews.comment: Wish there were more options or allow us to make our own boxes

reviews.comment: Very good organizer for someone who isn\'t organized at all

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Im a dreamer and this app is wonderful. Very inspiring. Must have for any woman planning a future with a special man. <3

reviews.title: Great!
